title: GOALIE FIGHT!! MN Wild Goalie Prospect Adam Vay Shows Why You Don't Want To Challenge Him... | Wild Blog | K102
text:
Search Icon Created with sketchtool. GOALIE FIGHT!! MN Wild Goalie Prospect Adam Vay Shows Why You Don't Want To Challenge Him... posted by Aj Mansour - share 
It's not often that you see a goalie fight in professional hockey. It's even less likely that the few goalie fights that do occur have any relation to the Minnesota Wild. Wednesday night in an ECHL game, we saw all of the above! 
A goalie prospect for the Minnesota Wild named Adam Vay took it upon himself to join in on the fun as two teams had lost sight of the puck and were dropping gloves left and right. After challenging the opposing goalie to fisticuffs, Vay quickly showed the world why accepting the offer to spar was a bad choice for the guy in white/red! Contact
